meta.title: 96 Materials | Construction Materials You Can Trust

home.intro: 96 Materials Co., Ltd. is not just a construction materials company but a partner in building the future, committed to quality, product diversity, and excellence in modern construction.

quality.title: Product Diversity
quality.description: One of the outstanding qualities of 96 Materials Co., Ltd. is the diversity and coverage of its products. Understanding the varied needs of the construction industry, the company offers a wide range of materials to meet different project requirements. From basics like concrete and rebar to finishing materials like tiles and paint, 96 Materials ensures customers have everything they need in one place. This one-stop solution simplifies procurement and saves valuable time and resources for contractors.

service.title: Customer-Centric Service
service.description: In an industry where time is critical, 96 Materials Co., Ltd. stands out through its customer-focused service. The company takes pride in its knowledgeable and responsive customer service team, ready to assist with product inquiries, ordering, and after-sales support. By building strong customer relationships, 96 Materials ensures that customer satisfaction is a top priority. This commitment to service excellence has earned it a loyal customer base and a reputation for reliability.

reliability.title: Sustainability & Innovation
reliability.description: In today's environmentally conscious world, sustainability is essential. 96 Materials Co., Ltd. is committed to promoting sustainable construction practices by offering eco-friendly products and solutions. The company continually sources materials that reduce environmental impact without compromising quality. Additionally, 96 Materials stays at the forefront of innovation, exploring new technologies and materials to meet the evolving needs of the construction industry.

about.title: About Us
content: The core value of 96 Materials Co., Ltd. is an unwavering commitment to quality. The company carefully selects materials from trusted manufacturers to ensure that every product meets strict industry standards. Whether itâ€™s cement, steel, or finishing materials, customers can trust they are receiving high-performance and durable products. This dedication not only strengthens construction projects but also gives peace of mind to builders and users alike.

productList.name: Ready-Mixed Concrete
productList.description: Essential construction materials such as concrete, mortar, and high-quality bricks.

productList.description: Industry-standard rebar and cement certified for strength and durability.

productList.description: High-quality paints, tiles, sanitary ware, and home decorative materials.

productList.name: Triple Socket Plug
productList.description: Electrical accessories including cables, switches, and socket outlets.

productList.name: Copper Wire
productList.description: High-grade copper wire, switches, and essential electrical installation supplies.
